content.text:
# Farnley and Wortley (ward)

| party1      = Green
| councillor2 = Kate Haigh
| party2      = Labour
| councillor3 = Adrian McCluskey
| party3      = Labour
| population     = 18,214
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Farnley and Wortley is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in west Leeds, West Yorkshire, covering the urban areas of Farnley and Wortley.
Councillors since 1980
represented Wortley (1987-1998). Member of Parliament for Leeds North East since 1997.]]
represented Farnley and Wortley (2022-2024). Member of Parliament for Leeds South West and Morley since 2024.]]
